testCases.title: IVR System Call Handling Validation
testCases.description: Verify the automated call handling process through the IVR system.

steps.stepDescription: Initiate an inbound call to the IVR system.
Follow IVR prompts and menu options.
Test various call scenarios (different menu options, invalid inputs).
Verify call handling for different call types (sales, support).

testCases.title: Call Queue and Priority Management Verification
testCases.description: Verify call queuing and priority management.

steps.expectedResult: Calls are placed in a queue and wait for agent availability.

steps.stepDescription: Assign different priority levels to calls.
steps.expectedResult: Calls with higher priority are prioritized in the queue.

steps.stepDescription: Test queuing under different scenarios (high call volume, priorities).
Verify the handling and routing of queued calls.
steps.expectedResult: Queued calls are routed based on priority and availability.

testCases.title: Call Transfer and Escalation Functionality Testing
testCases.description: Validate call transfer and escalation functionality.

steps.stepDescription: Transfer the call to another agent.
Escalate the call to a supervisor.
Verify call history and tracking throughout the transfer process.
steps.expectedResult: Call history accurately reflects transfers and escalations.

testCases.title: Outbound Call Functionality Testing
testCases.description: Validate the functionality of initiating outbound calls for sales, marketing, and customer service.

steps.stepDescription: Initiate an outbound call for a sales activity.
Provide required caller information (Caller Name, Number).
Verify call initiation for various scenarios (sales activities, campaigns).
steps.expectedResult: Call initiation is successful in each scenario.
